name: Banjo KaUNITY: A Tech Demo
description:
Requires controller. (Only tested with Xbox controller)

Left Thumbstick - Movement

Right Thumbstick - Camera

A Button - Jump, Double Jump

Left Trigger - Crouch

Left Trigger + A Button - Crouch Jump

Jump into Trees to Climb

Most of the time was spent developing the character controls, not the map.
